JobTitle: Regional Lead - Eats For Business, US and Canada
JobFullDesc: Whether it’s a sandwich, a burrito, or groceries, the Uber Eats team builds technology to connect people with what they want, when and where they want it. Our Strategy & Ops team empowers our regional and local teams through insights, analysis, and thought leadership.About the RoleWe’re looking for a Regional Lead to help scale Eats for Business in the US and Canada. Sitting at the intersection of two of the fastest growing Uber business units (Uber Eats and Uber for Business), Eats for Business has become one of the most exciting opportunities within Uber!Businesses spend nearly $200 billion annually on food, and delivery is a growing percentage of that spend. Whether we’re feeding employees working from home, virtual event attendees, or essential workers who are ordering lunch every day, there are numerous opportunities to help our clients support their employees, customers and overall business objectives with meal delivery.Over the past year, we have made significant progress in corporate ordering, adding numerous Fortune 500 customers to our client base. Now, we are expanding our team to help us take the business to the next level.In this role, you will be responsible for the Eats for Business performance in your region, including gross bookings and margin.
